desc: Supplying the very best in high quality rabbit toys, tasty treats & healthy forage for rabbits & other small pets in your home. Wild About Bunnies is a small pet supplies specialist that is passionate about rabbit care & welfare, aiming to help all rabbits be happy & healthy.

layout.text: We offer free shipping on all mainland UK orders over £39*. Shipping is calculated at checkout.**Northern Ireland and remote postcodes may incur an additional £2.40 surcharge**
